MirrorCam: A camera that captures your surroundings while also reflecting your image, creating a unique and innovative perspective.
SmartSpectrum: A camera that can capture images in a wide range of lighting conditions, from low light to bright sunlight.
AirCam: A camera that can be worn as a pendant or clipped onto clothing, allowing you to capture photos and videos from a unique perspective.
NightVision: A camera that can capture high-quality images and videos in complete darkness, using advanced night vision technology.
WaterproofCam: A camera that can withstand water pressure and capture images and videos underwater, making it perfect for underwater photography.
